oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Constitutional Association of Montreal [microform.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Constitutional Association of the City of Montreal.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Signed: P. M'Gill, Chairman, J. Guthrie Scott, Secretary.
Filmed from a copy of the original publication held by the Department Rare Books and Special Collections, McGill University, Montreal.
